title: Condensed, sans serif Daedo logo
content:
Hi - Can anyone tell me what Daedo is set in?

Font: 

 Techno 

Solved By: 

 [fvilanakis](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317114251/http:/typophile.com/user/176276 "View user profile.")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [daedo color horizontal (Large).jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317114251/http:/typophile.com/files/daedo%20color%20horizontal%20(Large).jpg) | 62.8 KB |
author: Falani

comments.content: It must be **[Techno](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317114251/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Font-Bureau&ffam=Techno%20-%20Regular&fid=d93b5cc1ee5c05bae82463f375113a7f&fsize=60&text=Daedo&fit=1)** by Font Bureau [1995-1997] also published by Apple
